measurement_conditions: 95th percentile (p95) latency under nominal load (500 RPM).
improvement_opportunities: Optimize password hashing algorithm cost factor; Cache user data.
business_relevance: Directly impacts user experience on every login.

performance_area: Protected gRPC Endpoint (with JWT Blocklist Check)
measurement_conditions: Additional p95 latency introduced by the blocklist guard.
load_profile: 1000 RPM on a sample protected endpoint.
improvement_opportunities: Optimize Redis connection pooling; Use a more performant Redis client.
business_relevance: Ensures security feature does not degrade overall application performance.
